mapper.sql: logid, corp_id, corp_name, config_type, notice_type, notice_channel, notice_address, cur_state, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM as_notice_config WHERE 1=1 AND (logid = #{logid} OR logid LIKE '%'||#{logid}||'%') '%'+#{logid}+'%') CONCAT('%', #{logid}, '%')) ORDER BY create_time DESC
select * from as_notice_config where cur_state = #{NoticeConfig.cur_state} and corp_id = #{NoticeConfig.corp_id} and notice_type in #{noticeType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO as_notice_config( logid, corp_id, corp_name, config_type, notice_type, notice_channel, notice_address, cur_state, create_time ) VALUES( #{logid}, #{corp_id}, #{corp_name}, #{config_type}, #{notice_type}, #{notice_channel}, #{notice_address}, #{cur_state}, #{create_time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE as_notice_config SET logid = #{logid}, corp_id = #{corp_id}, corp_name = #{corp_name}, config_type = #{config_type}, notice_type = #{notice_type}, notice_channel = #{notice_channel}, notice_address = #{notice_address}, cur_state = #{cur_state}, create_time = #{create_time} WHERE logid = #{logid}
